price: Enyi mlio amini! Mt'iini Mwenyezi Mungu, na mt'iini Mtume, wala msiviharibu vitendo vyenu.
arabic: ۞ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱلرَّسُولَ وَلَا تُبۡطِلُوٓاْ أَعۡمَٰلَكُمۡ
footnotes: Enyi mlio amini! Mt'iini Mwenyezi Mungu katika aliyo kuamrisheni, na mt'iini Mtume kwa hayo anayo kuitieni, wala msivipoteze vitendo vyenu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū aṭīʿū al-laha wa-aṭīʿū al-rasūla walā tub'ṭilū aʿmālakum
